executable.title: EMSegment Simple
executable.description:
This module is under construction.
The EMSegment Simple module provides a simplified interface to the EMSegment algorithm. It should be used to segment new images once a parameter set has been established. You must specify (1) the MRML scene that contains the EMSegment parameters, (2) a file that the output labelmap will be stored in, and (3) a set of target input images.
The MRML scene that contains the parameters should be generated using the EMSegment module. A library of example parameter files is available at the wiki page. If you have one that might be useful to others, please consider contributing it.
The result labelmap can be any file name that you want to create (e.g., SegmentationResult.mhd).
You should specify as many target images as are present in the EMSegment parameter set (e.g., 2 if the set uses an MR T1 and MR T2 image). These images should be aligned.
executable.contributor: Many people and organizations have contributed to the funding, design, and development of the EMSegment algorithm and its various implementations.
